metadata.title: USN-5843-1 -- tmux vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that tmux incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5843-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tmux - 3.2a-4ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
